revision.text:
===Description=== Some [[List_of_Pokémon_with_attack|Pokémon]] have Alternate Forms. Only one Form is required to complete the Pokédex; however, obtaining all the forms of a Pokémon is highly recommended. For Pokémon only available during events, click [[Events|here]].
